main event: A sighting of two unidentified flying objects observed on the night of July 22, 1965, in Mount, Illinois.
interesting points: The objects were described as round and disc-shaped with a yellowish tint., The observer noted that they did not blink like airplanes., The sighting lasted about 1 minute and included two witnesses., The objects appeared maneuverable and solid., The final direction of the objects was northeast before disappearing.
sighted object: two disc-shaped objects in the sky
witness description: Individuals from a children's school observing the objects.
